import React from "react"; import { Card, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Accordion, Table } from "react-bootstrap" import Moment from 'react-moment'; import 'moment-timezone'; import VitalsTable from "../Vitals/VitalsTable" function PatientCard(props) { return ( Unit Responding: {props.patient.respondingUnit} ETA: {props.patient.ETA} Vitals {/* {props.patient.vitals.slice(0).reverse().map(vitals => )}
Time HR RR BP O2
{vitals.time} {vitals.HR} {vitals.RR} {vitals.BPs}/{vitals.BPd} {vitals.oxygen}%
*/} Last Update: {props.updatedAt} ) } export default PatientCard
